CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1954, pg. 11, reads: "Silver Year - Mr. and Mrs. William R. Lowry (above) celebrated their silver wedding anniversary, Feb. 26, at their home, 1231 Franklin Street, North Side. Attending the affair were their ten sons and daughters, nine grandchildren, six sisters and three brothers of Mr. Lowry and others in immediate family.  Close friends, too, were in attendance.  A buffet supper was served. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: William Lowry wearing diamond patterned tie and Vivian Lowry wearing flowers in hair, celebrating their twenty-fifth wedding anniversary, surrounded by group including Charles Lowry on left, Ella Mae "Auggie" Lowry Strothers, Bessie Lowry in background, Elaine Lowry in center, Pauline Lowry Crawford, Walter Lowry, and Charles Lowry Jr. with cigarette on right, in their home at 1231 Franklin Street, Northside
